hotels.description: In the heart of a marvellous metropolis, ANA Crowne Plaza Hotel Grand Court Nagoya, an IHG Hotel is ideally situated to discover the best of Nagoya's treasures. Gaze out over sweeping views of Nagoya from 30th-floor Sky Restaurant Star Gate bar as you indulge in a smooth scotch or savour sophisticated global dining at the multiple restaurants onsite. Then, strike out into the streets of Nagoya for a spot of retail therapy at the antique shops of Osu, just a 10-minute drive away.
